original_title: Sino'ng Pipigil sa Pagpatak ng Ulan?
overview: Rain started to pour on Rene's smooth, sunny life when he went to Tokyo for a business trip and met the love of his life, a Japanese woman whose life was cut short after giving birth to their child Rene Gallardo Jr. On his lonely flight back home with little Rene, he met Cielo Martinez who offers to complete  his life. Will it really solve the puzzle or will the rain just pour even harder on his life?
tagline: A powerhouse cast in an explosive, dramatic thunderbolt!
title: Sino'ng Pipigil sa Pagpatak ng Ulan?
